title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1903/94 of 27 July 1994 fixing the amount of the private storage aid for octopus (Octopus spp.)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1903/94 of 27 July 1994 fixing the amount of the private storage aid for octopus (Octopus spp.)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The private storage aid referred to in Article 16 of Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (3) shall be granted for the quantities offered for sale during the period 1 to 31 December 1993 up to a maximum quantity of 919 tonnes.
2. The amount of the aid for a maximum storage period of one month shall be ECU 45 per tonne net weight.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1994.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 228, 5. 8. 1989, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 111, 1. 5. 1990, p. 50.
(3) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
